movies.original_title: หมู่บ้านโคกะโหลก
movies.overview: A wave of chilling serial murders emerges, marked by the gruesome decay of male victims' secret part. As the police investigate, they confront eerie local myths and dark secrets.
movies.tagline: The legend awakens. terrifying. ridiculous. unstoppable.
movies.title: Ko Ga Loak Village

movies.original_title: ตี๋ใหญ่ ฤกษ์ดาวโจร
movies.overview: In 1980s Bangkok, a wily thief stages a series of daring heists, baffling the authorities and the public — until one cop sets out to take him down.
movies.tagline: Meet the "King of Thieves", whose life is coming to an end.
movies.title: Tee Yai: Born to Be Bad

movies.original_title: องค์บาก
movies.overview: When the head of a statue sacred to a village is stolen, a young martial artist goes to the big city and finds himself taking on the underworld to retrieve it.
movies.tagline: No computer graphics. No stunt doubles. No wires.
movies.title: Ong-Bak

movies.original_title: แฟลตเกิร์ล ชั้นห่างระหว่าง เ ร า
movies.overview: Two teen girls grapple with the realities of love, friendship and burgeoning adulthood when one of them has to leave the home where they both grew up.
movies.title: Flat Girls

movies.original_title: ดีว่า..ราวี
movies.overview: Imagine the excitement when four rival divas are brought together to perform on the same stage. But remember, when two ride on a horse, one must sit behind. So, how will these four divas share the spotlight without chaos?
movies.tagline: Battle for the limelight, grab the mic, and burn the stage!
movies.title: Beauty and the Beat

movies.original_title: ต้มยำกุ้ง
movies.overview: A young fighter named Kham must go to Australia to retrieve his stolen elephant. With the help of a Thai-born Australian detective, Kham must take on all comers, including a gang led by an evil woman and her two deadly bodyguards.
movies.title: The Protector

movies.original_title: ชัตเตอร์ กดติดวิญญาณ
movies.overview: When Jane and Tun run over a girl in a car accident, they speed away immediately from the crime scene. However, Tun, a photographer, soon discovers strange shadows in his photos, which unsettles them.
movies.tagline: The most terrifying images are the ones that are real.
movies.title: Shutter

movies.original_title: ช.พ.๑ สมรภูมิคืนชีพ
movies.overview: Inexperienced Thai soldiers battle a growing undead menace in this gruesome survival horror. A Japanese military experiment that turns men into monsters escapes containment, it’s up to these troops to save their nation from annihilation.
movies.title: Operation Undead

movies.original_title: ธี่หยด
movies.overview: When a remote village is plagued by a deadly curse, one brother must fight to save his family from a terrifying supernatural threat.
movies.tagline: The haunted, calling voices will follow you everywhere.
movies.title: Death Whisperer

movies.original_title: คนหิว เกมกระหาย
movies.overview: A talented young street-food cook pushes herself to the limit after accepting an invitation to train under an infamous and ruthless chef.
movies.tagline: There is a hunger that can never be fulfilled.
movies.title: Hunger

movies.original_title: นากรักมาก ม๊ากมาก
movies.overview: Two best friends, Peued and Uncle, set out to remake the timeless love legend of Mae Nak Phra Khanong, but things quickly spiral out of control when the real Mae Nak shows up to play herself. On a mission to find her true love, now reincarnated as Krist, a rising young actor.
movies.tagline: I'm coming to you with so much love!
movies.title: Nak Loves Mak Sooo Much!

movies.original_title: ช็อคโกแลต
movies.overview: Zen, an autistic teenage girl with powerful martial arts skills, gets money to pay for her sick mother Zin's treatment by seeking out all the people who owe Zin money and making them pay.
movies.title: Chocolate

movies.original_title: แปลรักฉันด้วยใจเธอ Side Story
movies.overview: The story of Oh Aew's last day in Phuket. Teh will take him to places they will remember before traveling to Bangkok. A short film follow-up to part 1 of the series "I Told Sunset About You".
movies.title: Last Twilight in Phuket

movies.original_title: ยูเรนัส 2324
movies.overview: Bonded in their youth and separated by tragedy, an astronaut and a free diver bend the laws of space and time in their efforts to be together again.
movies.tagline: Love is bigger than the universe and deeper than the ocean.
movies.title: Uranus 2324

movies.original_title: PlayBoy (and the Gang of Cherry)
movies.overview: The gay mafia Gang of Cherry is residing at a construction site somewhere in Thailand. One of its most notorious members is Mac aka PlayBoy, a gay male prostitute with an addiction for sm sex. Bipolar Cherry is the gang’s leader. The situation escalates when a shipment of drugs disappears.
movies.title: PlayBoy (and the Gang of Cherry)

movies.original_title: พนอ
movies.overview: Born during an ancient village ritual, Panor faces isolation as mysterious misfortunes plague those around her. She must uncover the truth behind the dark curse that has haunted her since birth.
movies.tagline: Get ready for the origin of the art of the devil.
movies.title: Panor

movies.original_title: จันดารา ปฐมบท
movies.overview: Jan, a young boy, grows up without a mother and is often insulted by his father. He struggles with his life as he longs to be with several women, even Madame Boonleung, his father's lover.
movies.tagline: A tragedy of lust, love and revenge…
movies.title: Jan Dara: The Beginning

movies.original_title: วิมานหนาม
movies.overview: When his partner Sek dies, Thongkam loses his property to his late love's eager family and must fight to reclaim the home they built together.
movies.title: The Paradise of Thorns

movies.original_title: After School วิ่งสู้ฝัน
movies.overview: A group of high school students follow the dream of having their own musical band and becoming artists. They spend their time after school to rehearse
movies.title: After School

movies.original_title: วิญญาณเลขที่ 13
movies.overview: Bussaba, a volleyball player who enjoyed bullying others, was found dead by hanging in a gym, causing chaos and horror among other team members.
movies.tagline: Attack me, attack back! play fair!
movies.title: Attack 13

tv_shows.overview: Fate led Bell, an unfortunate young woman, into prison, where she had to struggle for survival alone, without hope. That was until Claire, a mysterious female inmate, appeared to help her. And from that moment on... the encounter between these two souls began to fill this dark and desolate place with a small glimmer of light, one that gradually grew into love.

seasons.name: Pitbabe
seasons.overview: Charlie wants to be a racecar driver but he doesn't have a racecar of his own. The only solution he comes up with is to make a bizarre agreement with king of the raceway Babe, nicknamed Pit Babe. Even stranger, Babe agrees to help Charlie realize his dream.

seasons.overview: One year after Tony’s death, a hidden world of powers emerges. As Charlie fights to expose those exploiting them, his bond with Babe is tested when they uncover a deadly conspiracy led by Tony, who isn’t as dead as they believed.

The prize is a the opportunity to perform as the lead couple in a new Domundi Y series.

last_episode_to_air.name: The Convergence of Time
last_episode_to_air.overview: Finally, the entire story reaches its ultimate conclusion as Phukan discovers that what Cirrus said was a lie. His guardian doesn’t exist, and the lucky color doesn’t work. Everything was caused by an ordinary man named Cirrus. This is the first time Phukan has ever felt this angry. Why didn’t Cirrus tell the truth? Why didn’t he face things directly? Why lie? At the same time, Cirrus decides to confront his mother one last time, just as Wim chooses to face Jin. Will Phukan give Cirrus another chance?
